EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed: February 17
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Seminar. See event details below.
Date: Wednesday, 17 February 2016 Time: 8:15 AM - 10:30 AM Location: The Establishment, 252 George St, Sydney
{{my.Save the date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-seminar/sydney]]>.
